# The `indexed_accessor_iterator` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A utility class used to implement an iterator that contains some base object and an index. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A utility class used to implement an iterator that contains some base object and an index.

The iterator moves the index but keeps the base constant.

Definition at line 1203 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.
